00032 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00033 /// CGNATWindow
00034 ///
00035 /// @description  This class is the main dialog. It manages the menubars,
00036 ///               toolbars, and contents. The contents are stored in a
00037 ///               QStackedWidget showing different widgets as the user switches
00038 ///               between views.
00039 ///
00040 /// @limitations  None
00041 ///
